lines.text: Vic's dead... That is, you wish he were dead. And after he gets out tomorrow, you'll wish you were dead. When he went into that hospital a month ago, I thought it was your run-of-the-mill nervous breakdown. But Vic... is sick, Mick. Vic is a sick prick, Mick.
Ben, go home. Pack your bags, and leave town.
Nobody tells Ben London what to do any more!

[shoots Ben in the leg]
Ben, hop home, pack your bags, and leave town.
I'll hop home whenever I fucking feel like it!

[shoots the other leg]
Now, Ben, roll home, pack your bags, and leave town.
Hi, Lee.
Fuck you!
I've heard some nice things about you.
I don't give a flying fuck what you've heard!
If there is anything I can do to make your stay in town more comfortable...
[removing gun from shoulder holster and placing it on the table]
please don't hesitate to ask.
You can never really know the size of a person's brain until you have to clean it off the carpet, and let me tell you, Sleepy Joe had quite a brain.
This truth shit is fun! Does anybody else got anything to share with the group?
I am Brass-Balls Ben London! And oh, what a pair of balls had I!

[after Ben has been fatally shot next to a piano]
I judge a man's life by the way he dies, Ben. Your life was, uh, one note.

[Looking at Ben's dead body]
What happened to Ben?
He was rehearsing a one-man show. Closed.
That's too bad. I liked Ben. He had a fresh breath.

[on Jake's pills]
Nitroglicerine my ass. Those are tic tacs.
